TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstancePersistenceCommandException extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceException

Docs.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when an error occurs while processing a persistence command. The persistence provider may also free the instance handle against which the command was executed if the error would extend to future uses of the instance handle.

MemberSignature.Value: public Guid InstanceId { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Guid InstanceId

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of the instance against which the command was executed.
Docs.value: The ID of the instance. Returns Guid.Empty if the instance is not known or the command does not involve a specific instance.
